title: 10 Perch Land in Maharagama for Sale
details:
A valuable plot of land in Maharagama Arawwala is for sale. It is a rectangular shape flat land and situated between Maharagama and Piliyandala towns. There is access from both 341 and 296 bus routes to the land. Expecting Rs.590,000/- a perch (price can be negotiated after inspection)

Distance to ;

296 bus route - 700M

341 bus route - 1.1Km

Maharagama - 4Km

Piliyandala - 4.3 Km

The land is consist of a well, two iron gates and a parapet wall on all four sides. Pipe borne water and electricty is also available. Clean title and deeds. Bank loans can be obtained. Highly residential area with calm and peaceful environment.

Strictly No Brokers. Only genuine buyers are welcome

Call 0770-325852 for more details.
